tool_description: Analyzes and scores resume quality based on completeness, formatting, content relevance, and professional presentation standards.

resume_text.description: The full text content of the resume

contact_info.description: JSON string of extracted contact information

education_data.description: JSON string of extracted education information

experience_data.description: JSON string of extracted experience information

skills_data.description: JSON string of extracted skills information

job_target.description: Target job role for relevance scoring

scoring_weights.description: Weights for different scoring criteria [completeness, format, relevance, achievements]

industry_focus.description: Industry context for scoring (technology, healthcare, finance, etc.)

error_messages: Empty resume text: Provide non-empty resume_text content for scoring.
Invalid JSON data: Ensure contact_info, education_data, experience_data, and skills_data contain valid JSON strings.
Invalid scoring weights: scoring_weights array must contain exactly 4 numbers that sum to 1.0.
Unsupported industry: Use a recognized industry name or 'general' for industry_focus.
usage: Provide resume_text and extracted data from other parsing tools as JSON strings. Optionally specify job_target and industry_focus for targeted scoring, and adjust scoring_weights to emphasize different criteria.

relevance_score.description: Score for job relevance and keyword matching (0-100)

missing_sections.description: Resume sections that appear to be missing
